newsitem.title: USA: China Energy yr profit totals $0.66/shr.
newsitem.headline: China Energy yr profit totals $0.66/shr.

text.p: China Energy Resource Corp said on Wednesday that it reported 1996 revenues of $7.5 million and a profit of $1.26 million, or $0.66 a share, in its first full year of operations.

China Energy owns an 80 percent interest in Mishan Hua Xing Coke Ltd, a Chinese-foreign equity joint venture company that operate two coal production facilities in China and has exclusive mining rights to nearby coal reserves.
China Energy, which began as a joint venture in October 1995, received its American Stock Exchange listing in April 1997.
